conspire:Charge.NAME: Charge
conspire:Charge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals an additional !M! damage for each turn of combat.

conspire:ExplosiveBarrier.NAME: Explosive Barrier
conspire:ExplosiveBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If your Block is broken this turn, deal !M! damage to the attacker.

conspire:HitWhereItHurts.NAME: Hit Where it Hurts
conspire:HitWhereItHurts.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage is multiplied by 125% for each Vulnerable.
conspire:HitWhereItHurts.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage is multiplied by 150% for each Vulnerable.

conspire:Purge.NAME: Purge
conspire:Purge.DESCRIPTION: Lose 5 HP. NL Exhaust a card in your hand and permanently remove it from your deck. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust and remove from your deck

conspire:DoublingDagger.NAME: Doubling Dagger
conspire:DoublingDagger.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Shiv to your hand. NL Every time this card is played, increase its shiv count by 1 for this combat.
conspire:DoublingDagger.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Shivs to your hand. NL Every time this card is played, increase its shiv count by 1 for this combat.

conspire:PoisonWeapons.NAME: Poison Weapons
conspire:PoisonWeapons.DESCRIPTION: All unblocked attack damage is converted to Poison this turn. NL Exhaust.

conspire:SharedLibrary.NAME: Shared Library
conspire:SharedLibrary.DESCRIPTION: Gain all powers an enemy has.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL (Only applies to powers that you can have)

conspire:Banana.NAME: Banana
conspire:Banana.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! permanent Max HP. NL Exhaust.

conspire:SpireCoStock.NAME: SpireCo Stock
conspire:SpireCoStock.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Gold. NL Exhaust. NL Value may change over time.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! Gold. NL Exhaust. NL Value may change over time.

conspire:Blindness.NAME: Blindness
conspire:Blindness.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, you become unable to see enemy intents for this combat.

conspire:NecroticWound.NAME: Necrotic Wound
conspire:NecroticWound.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When this card is drawn, shuffle a Wound into your draw pile.
